QuestData.Title: Delivery for Orendil
QuestData.Description: Quickly, $n. I will put the Bathran's Hair into this bag, but you must deliver it to my master, Orendil Broadleaf. You will find him at Maestra's Post, just south down the road on the left.$B$BBut beware, we've received reports that the post is under attack from the Horde!
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Bag of Bathran's Hair to Orendil Broadleaf at Maestra's Post in Ashenvale.
QuestData.CompletionText: You're a brave one to come here given the circumstances.$B$BWhat business have you, stranger?
QuestData.RewardText: So, Evenar was succesful. Actually, more to the point, YOU were successful.$B$BI cannot thank you enough, $c, but there is more that must be done to the leaves before they will serve as a curative for what ails the child, Relara.
